com.rivelbop.rivelworks.preset

Class TopDownMovementPreset

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.preset.TopDownMovementPreset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class TopDownMovementPreset
extends com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
    A preset for non-physics basic top down, 8-directional movement.
    Author:
    Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private float speed
      The speed at which the object will travel.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite
      The sprite that the movement will be applied to.

      TopDownMovementPreset(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite, float speed)
      Creates a top-down movement object from the provided sprite object and its initial speed.
